name: He@rtstrings - Otome Visual Novel
description:
Recommended Route Order: Zach -> Hugo -> Yuki.  For best experience, this is the recommended order for the proper progression of the story,  avoiding spoilers along the way.

Disclaimer: This game contains topics related to abuse & suicide.

  • Nameable Heroine
  • User Choices
  • 3 Routes
  • Gallery (23 CGs)
  • Over 45k+ words in total
  • 12 Endings (3 Good Endings, 9 Bad Endings)
  • Character Design - Tokudaya
  • Background Art - Uncle Mugen, Potat0Master, konett, Capricious
  • CG  - Maria Lui, Peridot Amber, Yssah Riyuu, Izumi
  • Music - Alcaknight, Sakagami Souichi, Izumi
WindowsVersion: Windows Vista or higher
 CPU: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
 RAM: 2.0 GB
 Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 or DirectX 9.0cmacOSVersion: 10.10+
